<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/suppliers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new supplier record for tracking vendors and purchase order sources. Suppliers represent external companies from which assets and parts are procured.

**Workflow Example**
1. Prepare supplier data including name, contact information, and optional address.
2. Call this endpoint: [POST /api/v1.0/suppliers](/docs/api/suppliers/create-supplier) with the supplier object.
3. Extract `Item.SupplierId` from response for subsequent operations.
4. Reference the supplier when creating purchase orders or parts.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `Name`

**Optional Fields**: `Phone`, `ContactName`, `ContactEmail`, `SupplierUrl`

**Related Endpoints:**
- [GET /api/v1.0/suppliers](/docs/api/suppliers/get-supplier-by-id-post) - List existing suppliers
- [POST /api/v1.0/suppliers/\{supplierId\}/update](/docs/api/suppliers/update-supplier) - Update supplier details

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}

  parameters={undefined}

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Supplier data to create.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for creating or updating a supplier.","properties":{"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the supplier."},"Phone":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Primary phone number."},"SupplierNumber":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Internal supplier/vendor number."},"SupplierUrl":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Supplier website URL."},"ContactName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Primary contact person name."},"ContactEmail":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Primary contact email address."},"AdditionalContactName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Secondary contact person name."},"AdditionalContactEmail":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Secondary contact email address."},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Description or notes about the supplier."},"SupplierTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the supplier type category."},"AddressId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the supplier's address."}},"title":"UpdateSupplierRequest"},"example":{"Name":"IncidentIQ Demo Supplier","Phone":"555-123-4567","ContactName":"iiQ User","ContactEmail":"demo@incidentiq.com","SupplierUrl":"https://www.incidentiq.com"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
